# Setup

```{r, setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(readr)
library(patchwork)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.width = 6,
  fig.height = 6,
  out.width = "90%"
)

theme_set(
  ggthemes::theme_fivethirtyeight() + theme(legend.position = "bottom")
  )

options(
  ggplot2.continuous.colour = "viridis",
  ggplot2.continuous.colour = "viridis"
)

scale_colour_discrete = scale_color_viridis_d
scale_fill_discrete = scale_fill_viridis_d
```
